certified.label: Attributi Certificati
certified.description: Ovvero attributi riconosciuti agli aderenti da una fonte autoritativa.

verified.label: Attributi Verificati
verified.description: Attributes recognized by the providers to the users following an investigation. Alternatively, PDND Interoperability offers the possibility for lenders to rely on the investigations carried out by other lenders, if available.

declared.label: Attributi Dichiarati
declared.description: Attributes of which the user declares possession, acknowledging them under his own responsibility with a self-declaration.

noAttributesRequiredAlert: Non ci sono attributi {{attributeKey}} richiesti per questo e-service
